name: Cutics
description:
Developed during My First Game Jam Winter 2021 by Miguel Malagoli, Gabriel Fecury and Enrico Hion.

Simple symmetrical tactics game where the objective is to defeat the enemy Commander. Use your mouse to control. Enjoy!

--Instructions--

Take down the enemy commander to win!

Units have specific advantages and disadvantages against one another:

Infantry > Juggernaut

Juggernaut > Mech

Mech > Infantry

Land tiles will also affect your units, stay sharp!

The commander gives a bonus to adjacent units, use them wisely...

--You can find us on Discord!--

Enrico Hion (brownie#5613)
Gabriel Fecury (gabrielfecury#5217)
Miguel Malagoli (mimiboo#2236)

thank you for playing :)
